headline: Essential Security Checks for Modern Apps

digest_items.title: Implement password complexity requirements
digest_items.why: Weak passwords are easily cracked by brute force attacks
digest_items.fix: Require minimum 12 characters with mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols

digest_items.title: Review user access permissions
digest_items.why: Stale permissions from former employees pose security risk
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly access reviews and remove unnecessary permissions

digest_items.title: Use TLS 1.3 exclusively
digest_items.why: Older TLS versions have known vulnerabilities and weaker cipher suites
digest_items.fix: Update server config to disable TLS 1.0, 1.1, 1.2 and enable only TLS 1.3

digest_items.title: Implement input validation
digest_items.why: Unvalidated input leads to injection attacks and data corruption
digest_items.fix: Validate all user input on both client and server side

digest_items.title: Verify API versioning strategy
digest_items.why: Deprecated API versions may have unpatched vulnerabilities
digest_items.fix: Maintain clear deprecation timeline and force upgrades for old versions

digest_items.title: Review third-party vendor access
digest_items.why: Excessive vendor permissions increase attack surface and compliance risk
digest_items.fix: Audit vendor access quarterly and apply principle of least privilege
